text: Nimatullah Kassab Al-Hardini (1808â€”1858) is a Catholic saint. He was a Lebanese Maronite father who living in Kfifane, Lebanon. He died in Kfifane on December 14, 1858. Nimatullah was canonized on May 16, 2004 by Pope John Paul II. He is remembered on December 14, the date of his death. ==Other websites== *Vatican biography of Nimattullah Kassab Al-Hardini Category:1808 births Category:1858 deaths Category:Christian saints Category:Lebanese Christians Category:Maronites
title: Nimatullah Kassab Al-Hardini
